description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任洛阳市副市长、南阳市市长等职。2012年因涉嫌受贿罪被终止全国人大代表资格。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Mayor of Luoyang and Mayor of Nanyang. In 2012, his qualification as a delegate to the National People's Congress was terminated due to suspicion of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，朱广平的家乡。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, and the home province of Zhu Guangping.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省下辖的地级市，朱广平的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Henan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zhu Guangping.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省郑州市的综合性大学，朱广平曾在此就读。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Zhengzhou, Henan, China, where Zhu Guangping studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国洛阳市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Luoyang City, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党洛阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党洛阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在洛阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Luoyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国南阳市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Nanyang City, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党南阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党南阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在南阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Nanyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一种职务犯罪，指国家工作人员利用职务上的便利，索取或非法收受他人财物，为他人谋取利益的行为。
description.en: A crime of official misconduct, referring to the act of a state functionary who takes advantage of their position to demand or illegally accept property from others in exchange for seeking benefits for them.

description.zh-cn: 朱广平是河南开封人。
description.en: Zhu Guangping is a native of Kaifeng, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 朱广平早年曾参加中国人民解放军。
description.en: Zhu Guangping joined the People's Liberation Army in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 朱广平曾入学郑州大学中文系。
description.en: Zhu Guangping was enrolled in the Department of Chinese Language at Zhengzhou University.

description.zh-cn: 1999年至2003年，朱广平担任洛阳市副市长。
description.en: From 1999 to 2003, Zhu Guangping served as the Deputy Mayor of Luoyang.

relationships.target: 中国共产党洛阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2003年至2006年，朱广平担任中共洛阳市委副书记。
description.en: From 2003 to 2006, Zhu Guangping served as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Luoyang Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党南阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2006年，朱广平担任南阳市委副书记。
description.en: In 2006, Zhu Guangping served as the Deputy Secretary of the Nanyang Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2006年担任南阳市代市长，次年（2007年）正式担任市长，直至2012年案发。
description.en: He served as the Acting Mayor of Nanyang in 2006, and officially became the Mayor the following year (2007), holding the position until the bribery case in 2012.

position.zh-cn: 第十一届全国人大代表
position.en: Delegate to the 11th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 朱广平曾是第十一届全国人大代表，其代表资格于2012年10月被终止。
description.en: Zhu Guangping was a delegate to the 11th National People's Congress, and his qualification was terminated in October 2012.

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌受贿罪，朱广平被终止全国人大代表资格，其政治生涯中断。
description.en: Due to suspicion of bribery, Zhu Guangping's qualification as a delegate to the National People's Congress was terminated, ending his political career.

description.zh-cn: 朱广平是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zhu Guangping is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.
